message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $130 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $110 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $115.  Let's split the difference and make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $115, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $112?
